title: Calories in Roasted Potatoes
meta_description: Discover calories in potatoes roasted per 100g, including carbs, protein, fat, fiber, and tips for variations to fit your diet.
assumptions: Plain roasted potatoes, skin on, no added oil, butter, or seasonings; oven-roasted at moderate heat.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by potato variety, size, cooking time, added fats, and seasonings. Check labels or use a tracker for precision.

quick_answer.text: 100g of plain roasted potatoes provides about 93 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts panels for straightforward comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g of roasted potatoes?
faqs.a: About 93 kcal for plain roasted potatoes without added fats.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in roasted potatoes?
faqs.a: Around 21g carbs per 100g, with 2.2g fiber and 0.9g sugars.

faqs.q: Do roasted potatoes have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 2.5g protein and minimal 0.1g fat per 100g when plain.

faqs.q: How does roasting affect potato calories vs. boiling?
faqs.a: Roasting without oil keeps calories similar to boiling (~77-93 kcal/100g); added fats increase them.
Plain versions have just 7mg sodium per 100g; seasonings can raise it significantly.
